{"id":363439313,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1594142346,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"348 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/363439313/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Island Perimeter","memory":"96.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int islandPerimeter(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        int ans = 0; \n        array<int, 5> dirs {0, 1, 0, -1, 0}; \n        for (int i = 0; i < grid.size(); ++i) {\n            for (int j = 0; j < grid[i].size(); ++j) {\n                if (grid[i][j] == 1) {\n                    for (int x = 1; x < 5; ++x) {\n                        int new_i = i + dirs[x - 1]; \n                        int new_j = j + dirs[x]; \n                        if (new_i < 0 || new_i >= grid.size() || new_j < 0 || new_j >= grid[new_i].size() || grid[new_i][new_j] == 0) {\n                            ++ans; \n                        }\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans; \n    }\n    \n    \n    \n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"island-perimeter"}
